text.div:
HSPC Admission Source value set

Select Intermountain Healthcare HDD code system values.

Copyright Statement: Intermountain Healthcare

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-admissionSource defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
102702 Clinic Referral The source of admission is from a clinic.
17567 Court/Law Enforcement The source of admission is from a court or law enforcement
17566 Emergency Room The source of admission is from an emergency department
528129525 From Home Or Work The source of admission is from the individual's place of residence or employment
102703 HMO Referral The source of referral is from a health management organization
219107 In-Hospital Transfer The source of admission is a transfer from one area of the hospital to another
528129526 Newborn From an Outside Hospital The source of the newborn admission is from a facility not associate with the organization
154642 Normal Newborn The source of admission is a routine birth of a newborn at an internal birthing facility
102701 Physician Referral The patient was referred for admission by a physician
528129527 Premature newborn within the hospital The source of admission is a premature birth at an internal birthing facility
510105657 Readmission to Same HHA The patient was readmitted to the same home health agency as the previous admission
528129528 Sick newborn within a hospital The admission is due to an infant becoming ill at an internal neborn facility
510105655 Transfer From A Critical Access Hospital The source of admission is an external critical care access facility
102704 Transfer from a Hospital The source of admission is an external hospital
14689616 Transfer from a SNF The source of admission is a transfer from a skilled nursing facility
528129529 Transfer From Acute Care Hospital The source of admission is a transfer from an acute care hospital
520442099 Transfer From Ambulatory Surgery Center The source of admission is a transfer from an ambulatory surgery facility
14690444 Transfer from Other Facility The source of admission is a transfer from an external facility
510105656 Transfer From Another HHA The source of admission is a transfer from an external home health agency
528129530 Transfer from hospice The source of admission is a transfer from a hospice facility
510105654 Transfer From Pysch, Substance Abuse or Rehab Hosp The source of admission is a transfer from a psychiatric, substance abuse, or rehabilitation facility

name: HSPC Admission Source value set
description: Select Intermountain Healthcare HDD code system values.

concept.definition: The source of admission is an external critical care access facility
